titleStmt.title: The late commotion of certaine papists in Herefordshire Occasioned by the death of one Alice Wellington, a recusant, who was buried after the popish maner, in the towne of Allens-Moore, neere Hereford, vpon Tuesday in Whitsun weeke last past. 1605. With other excellent matter thereby occasioned. Truely set forth.
titleStmt.author: Hamond, Thomas, fl. 1605.
E. R., fl. 1605. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: By S[imon] S[tafford] for I. Chorlton, and F. Burton,

notesStmt.note: Contains three letters--one from Hamond to E.R., two from E.R. to Hamond--and a prayer.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
